text:
@GabbyOrr_ @VP @nancook Trump, Kushner & Meadows are tired from winning..........any doofus can understand that.

Pence, Rump-swab in Chief, doesn't have anything else in his portfolio. Besides some good coronavirus talk beats kissing Bone Spur's arse any day of the week.
